name: Agape Community Center
description: Agape Community Center (ACC) provides holistic social services and programs to all ages within the community. ACC is an association of Golden Gate Christian Church (GGCC), that serves the Richmond District of San Francisco for many years through its adult and children programs. Office hours vary, please call before visiting.
